org.eng.storage

Interface IItemStorage<ITEM>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDeleteableItemStorage<ITEM>, IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IClassifierStorage, IFieldedItemStorage<ITEM>, INamedItemStorage<ITEM>, INamedSerializableStorage<SITEM,METADATA>, IReferencedSoundSpecStorage, ISegmentedSoundStorage, ISerializableStorage<SITEM,METADATA>, ISoundStorage, IStringSetStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFiledItemStorage, FileSoundStorage, JSONFiledItemStorage, SerializedFiledItemStorage

    public interface IItemStorage<ITEM>
extends IDeleteableItemStorage<ITEM>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String add(ITEM item)
      Store the given item in storage and return an associated identifier
      boolean update(String id, ITEM item)
      Updates the item with the given id.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eng.storage.IDeleteableItemStorage

        clear, delete, delete

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eng.storage.IReadOnlyStorage

        connect, count, disconnect, findItem, findItems, getIDs, isConnected, items

    • Method Detail

      • add

        String add(ITEM item)
    throws StorageException
        Store the given item in storage and return an associated identifier
        Parameters:
        item -
        Returns:
        never null. A unique identifier that is considered opaque to the caller.
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • update

        boolean update(String id,
               ITEM item)
        throws StorageException
        Updates the item with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of previously stored item.
        item - new value for item at the given id.
        Returns:
        false if the item with id was not found, otherwise true and item was updated.
        Throws:
        StorageException - if the id is invalid.
